hero_image.title: Hero image - Profesjonalne strony internetowe dla firm
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja z laptopem wyświetlającym nowoczesną stronę firmową, workspace z notesem i akcesoriami biurowymi
hero_image.alt_text: Laptop z nowoczesną stroną firmową na białym biurku z notatkami i akcesoriami biurowymi
hero_image.prompt: Minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying modern business website with clean design, white wooden desk, yellow notebook with black pen, smartphone, coffee cup, natural daylight from side window, professional business aesthetic, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, high quality, sharp focus, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: professional business website laptop workspace minimalist
stock_suggestions.pexels_query: business website design laptop office desk
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean minimalist office setup, laptop showing business website, neutral colors with subtle accents

section_media.title: Udział systemów CMS na rynku stron firmowych
section_media.description: Wykres kołowy pokazujący dominację WordPressa (40%) oraz inne popularne systemy CMS
section_media.alt_text: Wykres udziału systemów CMS - WordPress 40%, inne platformy w rynku stron firmowych
section_media.prompt: Clean pie chart showing CMS market share, WordPress 40% in blue, other platforms in smaller segments, minimalist design, professional infographic style, gray and blue colors with subtle yellow accent, white background, clear labels

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: market share pie chart business analytics
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional business chart, clean design. Could create with Canva templates or chart libraries.

section_media.title: Porównanie kosztów WordPress vs konstruktory vs rozwiązania dedykowane
section_media.description: Tabela porównująca koszty początkowe, miesięczne i rozwoju dla różnych opcji technologicznych
section_media.alt_text: Tabela porównania kosztów WordPress, konstruktorów stron i rozwiązań dedykowanych dla firm
section_media.prompt: Clean comparison table showing cost breakdown for WordPress vs website builders vs custom solutions, three columns, rows for initial cost, monthly fees, development costs, professional business style, black and white with yellow highlights, minimalist design

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean comparison table, professional layout. Canva has excellent table templates for this.

section_media.title: Responsive design - statystyki urządzeń mobilnych
section_media.description: Infografika pokazująca 60% ruchu z mobile i wpływ responsive design na konwersję (25-30%)
section_media.alt_text: Infografika responsive design - 60% ruchu mobilnego zwiększa konwersję o 25-30% dla firm lokalnych
section_media.prompt: Vertical infographic showing mobile usage statistics, 60% mobile traffic icon, responsive design concept with different screen sizes, conversion increase arrow showing 25-30%, clean minimalist design, gray and blue colors with yellow accents, professional business style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Modern infographic showing mobile vs desktop usage, conversion statistics, clean professional design

section_media.title: Proces migracji strony bez utraty SEO
section_media.description: Diagram procesu migracji w krokach: audyt → testowe środowisko → przekierowania 301 → monitoring
section_media.alt_text: Diagram procesu migracji strony internetowej bez utraty pozycji SEO w 4 krokach
section_media.prompt: Horizontal flowchart showing 4-step website migration process: audit, staging environment, 301 redirects, monitoring. Connected with arrows, clean icons for each step, professional infographic style, gray and blue colors with yellow highlights, white background

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean process diagram, step-by-step workflow. Could use Lucidchart or similar diagramming tools.

section_media.title: Dashboard Google My Business
section_media.description: Mockup interfejsu Google My Business pokazujący kluczowe metryki dla firm lokalnych
section_media.alt_text: Interfejs Google My Business z metrykami widoczności lokalnej i statystykami firm
section_media.prompt: Clean mockup of Google My Business dashboard interface showing local business metrics, search visibility statistics, customer actions, professional clean UI design, authentic looking interface elements, no personal data visible

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: google business dashboard local seo interface
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional business dashboard interface, clean design, authentic looking metrics and data

section_media.title: Czecklista bezpieczeństwa strony firmowej
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika z 5 elementami: SSL, backup, aktualizacje, RODO, monitoring
section_media.alt_text: Infografika bezpieczeństwa strony firmowej - SSL, backup, aktualizacje, RODO, monitoring
section_media.prompt: Vertical security checklist infographic showing 5 elements: SSL certificate, backup system, security updates, RODO compliance, monitoring. Shield icons, checkmarks, clean professional design, blue and gray colors with yellow accents, business style

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional security checklist, shield icons, numbered items. Canva has good security templates.
